creator: takashi.asfbugzilla@tks.st
text:
http://apr.apache.org/docs/apr/1.5/group__apr__skiplist.html#ga237063a88253165f074c04ab9b0f17a3 says:
"Return the first element in the skip list, leaving the element in the skip list."

This is the same as apr_skiplist_peek.
Thanks, fixed in r1604590 and backported to 1.5.x and 1.6.x
creator: covener@gmail.com
covener@gmail.com
text:
It turns out a very minor change to your testcase crashes w/o the patch, I got lucky in adding just a few extra calls.

Committed APR test based on your sample program and the #if 0 fix (1604598) to trunk.  Will backport later today.  Please check out trunk for feedback before I backport

creator: covener@gmail.com
text: last update was for the wrong bug
